column4: I had to buy windows xp pro and set it up to dual boot the bundle recovery ware xp is proprietary and wants to own your laptop exclusively
uh huh not necessarily xp just that toshiba bundleware backup version of xp
hrmm i think you are having the same proprietary issue i was having but if you ever figure it out let me know. I sure would like to know the fix for that one
I have since bought another computer and put windows xp back on that laptop and put ubuntu on the new computer.
